thread.section_title: Espai Barcelona apartments opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Espai Barcelona apartments | www.espaibarcelona.com
thread.title: Belinda Allen
thread.title_full: Espai Barcelona apartments evaluado por Belinda Allen

author: Belinda Allen
title: Belinda Allen
text: A nice characterful apartment in a very central location for visiting Barcelona. It is on a noisy road and could do with a bit of updating but it makes a good base if you're out sightseeing and eating out most of the time as we were!
